price: 20 Il sera soufflé dans la Corne : « Voici le Jour dont vous étiez menacés ! »
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wanufikha fī al-ṣūri dhālika yawmu al-waʿīdi
